original_text: Then you and your children may decide to turn back to the Lord. You may choose to obey him completely in everything that you think and in everything that you do. That is what I am commanding you to do today.
korean_text: 너와 네 자손이 네 하나님 여호와께로 돌아와 내가 오늘 네게 명령한 것을 온전히 따라 마음을 다하고 뜻을 다하여 여호와의 말씀을 청종하면

sentences.original_text: Then you and your children may decide
to turn back to the Lord
You may choose to obey him completely
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그를 온전히 순종하기를 선택할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: and in everything that you do
That is what I am commanding you
